Name: ChatGPT
Description: Large language model known for coding, text generation, and analysis capabilities. Available in free and Plus versions.

Name: Claude
Description: Advanced AI assistant known for nuanced analysis, writing, and ethical considerations. Available in Claude 3 family versions including Opus, Sonnet, and Haiku.

Name: Perplexity AI
Description: AI search engine and chatbot hybrid that provides real-time information with cited sources.

Name: Gemini
Description: Formerly Bard, integrated with Google's ecosystem. Offers multiple versions (Ultra, Pro, Nano) with varying capabilities.

Name: Copilot
Description: AI assistant integrated into Microsoft products, powered by OpenAI technology. Focused on productivity and enterprise use.

Name: Pi
Description: Conversational AI focused on natural dialogue and emotional intelligence. Designed for more personal interactions.

Name: LLaMA
Description: Open source model family that serves as foundation for many other AI applications. Multiple versions available for different use cases.

Name: Mistral
Description: Efficient language model available in both open source and commercial versions. Known for strong performance and growing ecosystem.

Name: Character.AI
Description: Platform for creating and chatting with AI personalities, including historical figures, fictional characters, and custom personas.

Name: Replika
Description: AI companion focused on emotional support and personal conversations. Offers customizable AI friend experiences.

Name: Poe
Description: Platform that provides access to multiple AI models including GPT and Claude in one interface.
